title: Basic Light tutorial
content: In this tutorial you will learn how to turn a light on and off.

Select **SimpleLamp** to transform your smartphone in a lamp

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/tutorials/simplelamp-item.png)

Scan the QR code with your smartphone.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/tutorials/qrscan.png)

Alternatively, click on _Open in this device_ to open the lamp locally.

Move the **set** component into the workspace

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/tutorials/basiclight/set.png)

Move the ![true](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/tutorials/true-component.png) component as in the figure below.

![QrCode](tutorials/basiclight/set-true.png)

In this way you are programming the system so that the **enabled** parameter sets to _true_, and the lamp will turn on.

![ok](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/tutorials/welldonesm.png) Well done!

You have learned the basics of Protobject.

Now try to change _true_ to **false** and restart the system. The lamp will turn off.
